artist: Artist: Taguchi Beisaku; Publisher: Mizuno Asajirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; winter exterior scene; group of fighting soldiers, firing rifles in the distance in left image; firing cannon with a single soldier watching, partially obscured by two snow-covered trees in center image; band of text in Japanese characters in top margin in center image; group of soldiers, one on a horse, overlooking fighting scene in right image, with faintly seen army in background
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of Major General Ōshima’s Heroic Counterintelligence during the Fierce Battle in Snow and Ice at Haicheng of the Righteous Forces’ Campaign against Qing
